title: on it by section 31 of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (as
heading: 1. The Medical Scientists Registration Board Approved Qualifications byelaw 2023 (S.I. No.334 of 2023) is hereby revoked with effect from the date
text_raw:
1. The Medical Scientists Registration Board Approved Qualifications byelaw 2023 (S.I. No.334 of 2023) is hereby revoked with effect from the date 
specified in paragraph 2(2) without prejudice to any applications for registration 
or restoration received by the board prior to that date.
text_norm: 1 medical scientist registration board approved qualification byelaw 2023 (s.i no.334 2023) hereby revoked effect date specified paragraph 2(2) without prejudice application registration restoration received board prior date

title: on it by section 31 of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (as
heading: 2. (1) The bye-law may be cited as the Medical Scientists Registration
text_raw:
2. (1) The bye-law may be cited as the Medical Scientists Registration 

Board Approved Qualifications (No. 2) bye-law 2023. 

(2) The bye-law comes into operation on 2/11/2023.
text_norm: 2 (1) bye-law may cited medical scientist registration board approved qualification (no 2) bye-law 2023 (2) bye-law come operation 2 11 2023

title: on it by section 31 of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (as
heading: In the bye-law –
text_raw:
3. 

In the bye-law – 

“the Act” means the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (no.27 of 
2005) (as amended from time to time); 

“the Register” means the register of the Medical Scientists Registration Board 
established under section 36(1)(a) of the Act.
text_norm: 3 bye-law - act mean health social care professional act 2005 (no.27 2005) (as amended time time) register mean register medical scientist registration board established section 36(1)(a) act

title: on it by section 31 of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (as
heading: 4. The Medical Scientists Registration Board, for the purposes of Section
text_raw:
4. The Medical Scientists Registration Board, for the purposes of Section 
38(2)(a) of the Act, hereby approves the following qualifications as attesting to 
the standard of proficiency required for registration in the Register: 

(1) Bachelor of Science (Honours) in Medical Science, Galway Mayo 

Institute of Technology 

(2) Bachelor of Science 

(Honours) 

in Medical Science, Atlantic 

Technological University 

(3) Bachelor of Science (Honours) in Biomedical Science, Technological 

University Dublin 

(4) Bachelor of Science (Honours) in Medical Science, Technological 

University Dublin 

(5) Bachelor of Science (Honours) Biomedical Science (Cork Institute of 
Technology and University College Cork - National University of Ireland, Cork) 

AND 

Diploma in Clinical Laboratory Practice (Cork Institute of Technology) 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd November, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [527] 3 

(6) Bachelor of Science (Honours) Biomedical Science (Cork Institute of 
Technology and University College Cork - National University of Ireland, Cork) 

AND 

Diploma in Clinical Laboratory Practice (Munster Technological University) 

(7) Bachelor of Science 

(Munster 
Technological University and University College Cork - National University of 
Ireland, Cork) 

(Honours) Biomedical Science 

AND 

Diploma in Clinical Laboratory Practice (Munster Technological University) 

(8) Bachelor of Science (Honours) in Biomedical Science, Dublin Institute 

of Technology. 

(9) Higher Diploma in Medical Science, Technological University Dublin 

The Minister for Health approves the making of this bye-law. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Health, 

18 September, 2023. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

GIVEN under the seal of the Medical Scientists Registration 
Board, 

2 November, 2023. 

COLM O’LEARY, 

Chairperson, Medical Scientists Registration Board. 

MARIE CULLITON, 

Member, Medical Scientists Registration Board. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [527]

title: on it by section 31 of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (as
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This bye-law identifies the qualifications awarded in the State which are 
approved by the Medical Scientists Registration Board as attesting to the 
standard of proficiency required for registration with the Medical Scientists 
Registration Board. 

This bye-law may be cited as the Medical Scientists Registration Board 
Approved Qualifications (No. 2) bye-law 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [527] 5
